name: multibundle-mapper
description: Writes `multibundle` produced bundles mapping to a file of chosen format (.json, .js, .html, etc).

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --src index.js --private --name-format code --param-list-format list --sort-by scope access category kind order --group-by scope category --separators true > README.md

author: Alex Indigo <iam@alexindigo.com>
